item.description:
July's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Learning from your Reading.

We've done a lot of reading lately. How do you learn from what you read? Do you go back and try to understand how your favorite author keeps you up all night? Do you reread a book over and over again? Do you try writing a pastiche? Do you type in a favorite passage so you can learn how every word works?

Conversely, it's just as useful to analyze books you *don't* like. What are the flaws that drive you crazy? How do you make sure you're not doing the same thing?

Also
Book / Magazine Exchange

This is another followup. Kathleen had a great idea: bringing some books to the Meetup. I know I have some books to pass along. And some recent issues of magazines and small press that I bought to see if I could write for them.

Let's do some trading!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers July Meetup
